title: Yatarato Sasshi no Ii Ore wa, Dokuzetsu Kuudere Bishoujo no Chiisana Dere mo Minogasazu ni Guigui Iku (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Romance   School Life   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Early Romance   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Kuudere   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Popular Love Interests
author: Fukada Sametarou   ふか田さめたろう
description:
Shirogane Koyuki, a girl known for her beauty and equally harsh tone, giving her the nickname ‘Venomous Snow White’, is saved by Sasahara Naoya as a man tried to hit on her.

She may try to act strong, but on the inside, she is merely a young girl. Having been saved by Naoya, Koyuki falls for him, and Naoya on his end falls for Koyuki’s innocent and cute attitude.

Both fail to be honest with each other, but eventually bring themselves closer to admit their feelings for each other.>
